wikipedia_page.main: John Charles Martin (25 July 1903 – 31 December 1976) was an English professional footballer who played as a central defender.

response: *Jack Martin (Australian footballer) (born 1995), Australian rules footballer for Carlton

*Jack Martin (drag racer), American drag racing driver; see Jim Warren
